item.description:
Hey All,

This isn't a real invite for a meetup, just more info as I'm not familiar with this site and it's kind of a pain....

So the meetup last night was great, even if it was only 4 of us, but the Cubs won (despite our bad game today :(

Anwyho, we were talking about meetup and decided instead of paying for it each month, lets just get a group email list together and hang out. Almost all the games are on at The Sports Grille right near The Garden and it's a fun place to watch them, so that should be our place. I'll prob cut this off around July 20, so send me your emails before then - lmryba@gmail.com. Or after a few games, we can always decide to meet up at other places - whatever works. Then with an email list too other people can plan games to watch as I'm out of town a lot of weekends coming up and I know that works better for a lot of people.

Go Cubbies!
Lauren

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: When do you guys want to meet next? :)
